sentences.sContent: The floor was vibrating to the beat of the music.
sentences.sCn: 地板随着音乐的节奏在颤动。

sentences.sContent: As air passes over our vocal cords, it makes them vibrate.
sentences.sCn: 气流通过我们的声带，使之产生振动。

words.tran: 振动的；充满生气的；响亮的；战栗的
[力] 振动的，震动性的；摇摆的
振动器；[电子] 振子；振动按摩器；振动滚筒；簧片

trans.tranOther: if something vibrates, or if you vibrate it, it shakes quickly and continuously with very small movements
